backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing transaction reference-field enhancements and associated frontend files for multiple features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend converter components and utilities including reference‑field updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark mode using OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the main converter page in the AppShell layout.
App layout providing header, footer, and container structure for all pages.
frontend/src/features/converter/componen: UI card explaining the three‑step workflow and benefits of Excel export.
Settings UI for bank template, date format, page range, and header detection, with reparse support.
Editable table component allowing users to modify, save, and delete parsed transaction rows.
Drag-and-drop or file-input PDF uploader with processing status and UI feedback.
frontend/src/features/converter/lib/bank: Defines bank-specific parsing templates and utilities for detecting and retrieving template configurations.
frontend/src/features/converter/lib/expo: Loads SheetJS at runtime and exports normalized transactions to a formatted XLSX file.
frontend/src/features/converter/lib/norm: Normalizes transaction dates and amounts to consistent formats for downstream processing.
frontend/src/features/converter/lib/pdfE: Loads PDF.js, extracts text from pages, detects bank type, and parses transactions with diagnostics.
frontend/src/features/converter/PdfToExc: Manages the upload→review→export flow, PDF extraction, normalization, and Excel export logic.
frontend/src/features/converter/types.ts: Type definitions for transactions, parsing settings, extraction results, and bank template configs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor creation and refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a placeholder hook for future backend queries, currently returning an empty object.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark mode with an emerald-themed design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, including goals, architecture notes, feature list, and known issues for an Indian bank statement PDF-to-Excel converter.
